name: Wild Dog Simulator
description:
Role play a Wild Dog :)

3D REAL SIMULATOR - You need to maintain your health, hunger, and energy to survive the forest!

EPIC BATTLES - Run after, howl, and race to catch prey such wild bears, wolves, foxes, and rabbits! Fight off your enemies who do not want you to survive in this dangerous forest!

CREATE A WILD DOG PACK - Create, unlock, and raise a pack of Wild Dogs to help you hunt and gather food, keep your strength up, and win battles against your enemies.

BE A REAL-LIFE WILD DOG - Gain experience points by trying to survive in this forest by searching for food, defeating your enemies, and attacking your prey!

GAIN A WILD DOG PERSPECTIVE - Easy controls so you can live your life as a wild dog! Zoom in and out to accomplish your Wild Dog missions!

This game features:
NEW CRAFT MISSIONS
3D REAL SIMULATOR
EPIC BATTLES
WILD DOG PACKS
HUNTING WILD BEARS, WOLVES, FOXES, and RABBITS
COLLECTING DIFFERENT COLORED GEMS FOR ENERGY POINTS
AWESOME HIGH-DEFINITION GRAPHICS
ESCAPING FROM WILD PREDATORS OUT TO DESTROY YOU
STRUGGLING TO SURVIVE IN AN UNKNOWN FOREST
3D WORLD TO DISCOVER AND EXPLORE

Role play a REAL LIVE WILD DOG!

Like us on Doodle Club!

Follow us on Chroma Club!
